ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then he wants Me to add yet more!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet he wants that I should give him more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and who still greedily desires that I should bestow upon him more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Yet he desires that I should give more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: After all that he desires that I should give more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And yet he desires that I should add more!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then he is eager that I should do more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Yet he desireth that I should give more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and yet, he greedily desires that I give him even more!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And who yet coveteth that shall increase.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Still he is eager that I should give him more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet is he greedy-that I should add (yet more);-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: After all that he desires that I should give more;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: yet he is eager that I increase him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he wants Me to add yet more!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he desires that I should add more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:15] Still he is eager that I should give [him] more.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Yet he) i.e. al-Walid (desireth that I should give more) wealth while disobeying and disbelieving in Me.
